reviews.review: this game is bullshit full of cheaters in fking prime. the number of cheaters in prime are more than non prime. i fking messaged their support to check my trust factor for being low and check me on overwatch. still nothing :D nice game. dying more and more cuz of cheaters :)

Over all the game is fun. The Maps are balenced (not nuke but stil), the guns are balenced. But theres one problem if you are playing in scandinavia or near that area. The Russians dont have a server, and the nearest one is the server in Stockholm. So That means that you need to be playing with them.
And first and for most theres a languadge barier as no russian want to be talking english. And that one problem can cost a whole gmae on its own.
And now the second problem, becouse they play from russia they have bad ping (I have seen up to 500 ping for a russian player) so it means that its super easy to kill them. And becouse of that the need help to win and they use cheats for that and thats the problem. 
PLZ VALVE fix this and make a server for them I think this whuld help us both as they can paly with there russian friends and we scandianvian with our friends. This i think whould help the hacking problem as they dont need to hack any more. If they have their own server.
